definition: being fearful or anxious in a specific situation
example: "That big dog is making me nervous."

definition: in a state of excitement; thrilled
example: "She could not sleep because she was so excited about the party."
"Lara was shy, but new friends have made her more confident"

definition: feeling pleased, satisfied, and worthy because of something one owns or has done
example: "I am proud of my good exam results"
"She had hopeful thoughts about passing the test"

definition: feeling sad because I can't be with my friends

definition: feeling trouble or anxiety about something that might happen
example: "He was very worried about the test because he had not studied enough."
